name: Gravedigger (Retro Ducks)
description:
One night, Johnny boy, who is in charge of burying the dead people in the graveyard his family owned for many, many generations, heard some strange noises outside his house. Troubled he went to investigate the source of that terrible sound and he sees that the dead people has risen, so he grabbed his loyal shovel and bashed back into their slumber. Then he proceeded further into the heart of the graveyard to find why the zombies have awoken.

Return the zombies to the realm of death and survive the other night!
